cause.description:
Donations go to Room to Read to help build schools, libraries, reading rooms, computer rooms and girls' scholarships in the developing world.
Projects range from $2500-35,000. For more information on the project, go to www.roomtoread.org, or read the book "Leaving Microsoft to Change the World" by John Wood.
1. World change starts with education children (Room To Read website)
cause.mission: Wolrd Change Starts with Educated Children
cause.name: Gen X for Room to Read
